metadata.description:
One of the many Are.na co-founders ðŸŽ©

http://charlesbroskoski.com

This channel serves the site http://mac.are.na , a collaborative music player.

To contribute, add youtube, soundcloud or mp3s to a channel (any other types will be ignored), and then connect that channel here!

Source code here: https://github.com/broskoski/mac.are.na

One of the many Are.na co-founders ðŸŽ©

http://charlesbroskoski.com

contents.title: Are.na / Bookmarklet
contents.description_html: With the bookmarklet, you can easily add images, videos, links, and text to your Arena channels while surfing the web.
contents.description: With the bookmarklet, you can easily add images, videos, links, and text to your Arena channels while surfing the web.

contents.description_html: Assemble and connect information.
contents.description: Assemble and connect information.

contents.description_html: Arena-for-Safari - Adds an are.na button to Safari
contents.description: Arena-for-Safari - Adds an are.na button to Safari

contents.description_html: arena - python interface to the are.na API

contents.title: Pilgrim / Pilgrim
contents.description_html: Pilgrim is a bookmarklet / web-crawler that aims to provide a better experience for consuming long-form text and exploring related materials on the web.
contents.description: Pilgrim is a bookmarklet / web-crawler that aims to provide a better experience for consuming long-form text and exploring related materials on the web.

contents.title: Slack channel to Are.na export
contents.description_html: slack-to-arena - Parses a slack export and uploads all links to are.na
contents.description: slack-to-arena - Parses a slack export and uploads all links to are.na

contents.content_html:
If you use IFTTT and have a Gmail account associated you can use their new apps Do Camera and Do Note to add items directly from your phone to your channels.

The email subject defines your target channel, so you can add multiple buttons directed to different channels.

Just search "are.na" from the app to add these recipes:

  • https://ifttt.com/recipes/264425-add-photo-to-an-are-na-channel
  • https://ifttt.com/recipes/264426-add-note-link-to-an-are-na-channel

The apps:

  • https://ifttt.com/products/do/camera
  • https://ifttt.com/products/do/note
contents.content:
If you use IFTTT and have a Gmail account associated you can use their new apps Do Camera and Do Note to add items directly from your phone to your channels.  

The email subject defines your target channel, so you can add multiple buttons directed to different channels. 

Just search "are.na" from the app to add these recipes:

- https://ifttt.com/recipes/264425-add-photo-to-an-are-na-channel
- https://ifttt.com/recipes/264426-add-note-link-to-an-are-na-channel

The apps:

- https://ifttt.com/products/do/camera
- https://ifttt.com/products/do/note

contents.description_html: Crawl connected Are.na channels and visualize the resulting network.

contents.title: Are.na Dispatch (@arena_dispatch) | Twitter
contents.description_html: The latest Tweets from Are.na Dispatch (@arena_dispatch). Digest of @aredotna channels, a couple per day. New York, NY
contents.description: The latest Tweets from Are.na Dispatch (@arena_dispatch). Digest of @aredotna channels, a couple per day. New York, NY

contents.title: Are.na / Import
contents.description_html:
To import your links to Are.na, start by exporting your bookmarks as an HTML file.

We currently support importing data from Pinboard, Pocket, Diigo, Delicious and browser bookmarks.

  • Instructions for Chrome
  • Instructions for Firefox
  • Instructions for Safari
  • Instructions for Pinboard links
  • Instructions for Pocket links
contents.description:
